profile.noAutoTweet: No tweet will be published, never
profile.autoTweetDescription: Features can sometimes ask you to enable this option to be able to do them. A tweet will be published once results are ready, no more.
profile.saveResultsDescription: By default, Affinitweet do not store your results in its database. You can keep an history of what you done (feature name + time).
profile.clearHistoryDescription: Your history will be lost for ever.
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Your account and history will be lost for ever.

error.time: This feature have a %{cooldown} seconds cooldown. Please retry in %{remainingTime} {seconds}.

legal.creator: Creator
legal.publisherText: The person responsible for publication is a natural person.
